0.text: Innate: Periodically, Poppy's next basic attack is empowered to throw her buckler, gaining  350 bonus range and dealing 20 − 180 (based on level) bonus magic damage. After it hits, the buckler then falls to a location near the target over 1 second, landing and remaining there for up to 4 seconds.
0.html: Innate: Periodically, Poppy's next basic attack is empowered to throw her buckler, gaining  350 bonus range and dealing 20 − 180 (based on level) bonus magic damage. After it hits, the buckler then falls to a location near the target over 1 second, landing and remaining there for up to 4 seconds.
markedPassages: 350 bonus range

1.text: Poppy can move over the buckler to retrieve it, gaining a  shield for  13 / 15.5 / 18% (based on level) of her maximum health for 3 seconds. If the buckler kills the target, it bounces back to Poppy instead of falling. Enemy  champions can move over the buckler to destroy it.
1.html: Poppy can move over the buckler to retrieve it, gaining a shield for  13 / 15.5 / 18% (based on level) of her maximum health for 3 seconds. If the buckler kills the target, it bounces back to Poppy instead of falling. Enemy champions can move over the buckler to destroy it.
markedPassages: shield
13 / 15.5 / 18% (based on level) of her maximum health
13 / 15.5 / 18% (based on level) of her maximum health
13 / 15.5 / 18% (based on level) of her maximum health
13 / 15.5 / 18% (based on level) of her maximum health
champions

0.text: Active: Poppy smashes the area in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit. Against  monsters, the damage based on their health ratio is capped.
0.html: Active: Poppy smashes the area in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit. Against monsters, the damage based on their health ratio is capped.

0.content: 40 / 60 / 80 / 100 / 120 (+ 90% bonus AD) (+ 8% of target's maximum health)

markedPassages: monsters

1.text: The impact creates a field for 1 second that  slows enemies within, which then ruptures to deal the same physical damage.
1.html: The impact creates a field for 1 second that slows enemies within, which then ruptures to deal the same physical damage.

1.content: 80 / 120 / 160 / 200 / 240 (+ 180% bonus AD) (+ 16% of target's maximum health)

markedPassages: slows

0.text: Passive: Poppy increases her  total armor and  total magic resistance by 10%, doubled to 20% while she is below 40% maximum health.
0.html: Passive: Poppy increases her  total armor and  total magic resistance by 10%, doubled to 20% while she is below 40% maximum health.
markedPassages: total armor
total magic resistance

1.text: Active: Poppy gains  40% bonus movement speed and creates an aura around herself for 2 seconds, causing all enemies who attempt to  dash into or within it to be dealt magic damage and  knocked up for 0.5 seconds. If a target was successfully interrupted, they become  grounded and  slowed by 25% for 2 seconds.
1.html: Active: Poppy gains  40% bonus movement speed and creates an aura around herself for 2 seconds, causing all enemies who attempt to dash into or within it to be dealt magic damage and knocked up for 0.5 seconds. If a target was successfully interrupted, they become grounded and slowed by 25% for 2 seconds.
markedPassages: 40% bonus movement speed
dash
knocked up
grounded
slowed

2.text: Steadfast Presence can only block a single dash per enemy per cast.
2.html: Steadfast Presence can only block a single dash per enemy per cast.

0.text: Active: Poppy  dashes to the target enemy's location. If they are in range upon arrival, she deals physical damage and  carries them along with her for up to 400 units.
0.html: Active: Poppy dashes to the target enemy's location. If they are in range upon arrival, she deals physical damage and carries them along with her for up to 400 units.
markedPassages: dashes
carries

1.text: If the target hits terrain, she stops to deal the same physical damage again and  stuns them for a duration.
1.html: If the target hits terrain, she stops to deal the same physical damage again and stuns them for a duration.
markedPassages: stuns

0.text: Active: Poppy  charges while being  slowed by 15% for up to 4 seconds to increase Keeper's Verdict's  range and  knock back distance over 0.5 seconds after the first 0.5 seconds of the channel. Keeper's Verdict can be recast within the duration.
0.html: Active: Poppy charges while being slowed by 15% for up to 4 seconds to increase Keeper's Verdict's  range and knock back distance over 0.5 seconds after the first 0.5 seconds of the channel. Keeper's Verdict can be recast within the duration.
markedPassages: charges
slowed
range
knock back

1.text: Recast: Poppy releases the charge to launch her hammer upwards, dealing physical damage to enemies nearby and in an area in front of her and  knocking them up for 1 second.
1.html: Recast: Poppy releases the charge to launch her hammer upwards, dealing physical damage to enemies nearby and in an area in front of her and knocking them up for 1 second.
markedPassages: knocking them up

2.text: If Keeper's Verdict was charged for at least 0.5 seconds, it deals 100% increased damage and enemies hit are  knocked back up-to 3400 units toward the enemy team's fountain. Additionally, if no enemies are hit in front of Poppy, she sends a shockwave that travels in the target direction until it collides with an enemy champion, which causes a hammer to erupt. Targets hit by the shockwave or the eruption receive the charged effects.
2.html: If Keeper's Verdict was charged for at least 0.5 seconds, it deals 100% increased damage and enemies hit are knocked back up-to 3400 units toward the enemy team's fountain. Additionally, if no enemies are hit in front of Poppy, she sends a shockwave that travels in the target direction until it collides with an enemy champion, which causes a hammer to erupt. Targets hit by the shockwave or the eruption receive the charged effects.
markedPassages: knocked back

3.text: If the charge is  interrupted or completes without reactivation, Keeper's Verdict is cancelled and the ability is put on a  15-second cooldown.
3.html: If the charge is interrupted or completes without reactivation, Keeper's Verdict is cancelled and the ability is put on a  15-second cooldown.
markedPassages: interrupted
15-second

4.text: Enemies knocked  airborne are  revealed and are rendered  untargetable while being displaced if Keeper's Verdict was charged for more than 0.5 seconds.
4.html: Enemies knocked airborne are revealed and are rendered untargetable while being displaced if Keeper's Verdict was charged for more than 0.5 seconds.
markedPassages: airborne
revealed
untargetable
